Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Ullet Suites - Guest House in Liverpool, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Sefton Park Palm House and Liverpool ONE. This guesthouse is within close proximity of Sefton Park and Sudley House.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 11 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include irons/ironing boards, and both cribs/infant beds (complimentary) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Conveniences include irons/ironing boards, and both cribs/infant beds (complimentary) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

When you stay at Ullet Suites - Guest House in Liverpool, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Sefton Park Palm House and Liverpool ONE. This guesthouse is within close proximity of Sefton Park and Sudley House.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sefton Park Palm House - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sefton Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sudley House - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Otterspool Park - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
University of Liverpool - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Philharmonic Hall - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Unity Theatre - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Everyman Theatre - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Liverpool Anglican Cathedral - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Royal Liverpool University Hospital - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Calderstones Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
FACT - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Liverpool Watersports Centre - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Concert Square - 3.3 km / 2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Liverpool (LPL-John Lennon) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Manchester (MAN) - 44.2 km / 27.5 mi

The preferred airport for Ullet Suites - Guest House is Liverpool (LPL-John Lennon).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
